title: Perfect CTA Placement: Above-The-Fold Vs. Below-The-Fold
excerpt: Should You Place a CTA Above the Fold? Experts in the design and digital marketing world have frequently claimed that if you want to get the best results with a CTA , you need to place it above the fold. Just look at this landing page from Lyft, for instance, you immediately see what you need to doâ€¦
